update wechat_charge_tb
channel_name = #{channelName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
action_name = #{actionName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},

where code = #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from wechat_charge_tb where ${strWhere} order by code desc
select channel_name,action_name,open_id,prize_name,prize_type,express_number,charge_time,card_no,card_pwd from wechat_charge_tb where is_delete=0 and open_id=#{openId,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}
select channel_name,action_name,open_id,prize_name,prize_type,express_number,charge_time,card_no,card_pwd from wechat_charge_tb where is_delete=0 and charge_code=#{chargeCode,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}
